dialogue.speaker: Alice
dialogue.message: I suggest we focus on gathering information about each other's actions and behavior to identify any suspicious activity that could potentially reveal the assassin among us.

dialogue.message: I agree with Alice's suggestion. Let's all be open about our actions and focus on gathering information to maintain trust within our group. I'll share that I plan to explore the outskirts of the town today.

dialogue.speaker: Charlie

dialogue.speaker: Bob

dialogue.speaker: Alice
